name: string-shot
effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Binds the foe with string to reduce its SPEED.
flavor_text.emerald: Binds the foe with string to reduce its SPEED.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The foe is bound with strings shot from the mouth to reduce its SPEED.
